00012 /**
00013  *      convert an associative array to a javascript block
00014  *
00015  *      @param array $container container array
00016  *      @return string
00017  */
00018 function array_to_js($container)
00019 {
00020         $ret = '<script type="text/javascript">'.nl();
00021         // sort container by keys
00022         ksort($container);
00023         $exists = array();
00024         foreach ($container as $key=>$val) {
00025                 // make sure the keys exist
00026                 $objs = expl('.', $key);
00027                 for ($i=0; $i < count($objs)-1; $i++) {
00028                         $obj = implode('.', array_slice($objs, 0, $i+1));
00029                         if (!in_array($obj, $exists)) {
00030                                 if ($i == 0) {
00031                                         $ret .= tab().'var '.$obj.' = '.$obj.' || {};'.nl();
00032                                 } else {
00033                                         $ret .= tab().$obj.' = '.$obj.' || {};'.nl();
00034                                 }
00035                                 $exists[] = $obj;
00036                         }
00037                 }
00038                 $ret .= tab().''.$key.' = '.json_encode($val).';'.nl();
00039         }
00040         $ret .= '</script>'.nl();
00041         return $ret;
00042 }

00045 /**
00046  *      make an array off associative array unique in a certain key-value
00047  *
00048  *      @param array &$a reference to array
00049  *      @param mixed $key key whose value we compare
00050  */
00051 function array_unique_element(&$a, $key)
00052 {
00053         // for each row
00054         for ($cur=0; $cur < count($a); $cur++) {
00055                 // look in every row further down
00056                 for ($i=$cur+1; $i < count($a); $i++) {
00057                         // to see if the value of a key in the array is the same as in the 
00058                         // current row
00059                         if ($a[$i][$key] == $a[$cur][$key]) {
00060                                 // delete the row further down
00061                                 array_splice($a, $i, 1);
00062                                 $i--;
00063                         }
00064                 }
00065         }
00066 }

00069 /**
00070  *      check if a directory already contains a file (based on its content)
00071  *
00072  *      @param string $dir directory to check
00073  *      @param string $fn file to look for
00074  *      @param string $orig_fn first check this filename (optional)
00075  *      @return (basename) filename of identical file in $dir or false if 
00076  *      there is none
00077  */
00078 function dir_has_same_file($dir, $fn, $orig_fn = '')
00079 {
00080         // strip any slash at the end of $dir
00081         if (substr($dir, -1) == '/') {
00082                 $dir = substr($dir, 0, -1);
00083         }
00084         if (empty($orig_fn)) {
00085                 $orig_fn = basename($fn);
00086         } else {
00087                 $orig_fn = basename($orig_fn);
00088         }
00089         
00090         if (($dir_fns = @scandir($dir)) === false) {
00091                 return false;
00092         }
00093         // optimization: check $orig_fn first
00094         if (($i = array_search($orig_fn, $dir_fns)) !== false) {
00095                 $a = array_splice($dir_fns, $i, 1);
00096                 array_unshift($dir_fns, $a[0]);
00097         }
00098         foreach ($dir_fns as $f) {
00099                 if ($f == '.' || $f == '..') {
00100                         continue;
00101                 }
00102                 if (!file_is_different($fn, $dir.'/'.$f)) {
00103                         return $f;
00104                 }
00105         }
00106         return false;
00107 }

00110 /**
00111  *      check if two directories are different
00112  *
00113  *      @param string $a filename
00114  *      @param string $b filename
00115  *      @return bool
00116  */
00117 function dir_is_different($a, $b)
00118 {
00119         if (substr($a, -1) == '/') {
00120                 $a = substr($a, 0, -1);
00121         }
00122         if (substr($b, -1) == '/') {
00123                 $b = substr($b, 0, -1);
00124         }
00125         
00126         $a_fns = @scandir($a);
00127         $b_fns = @scandir($b);
00128         if ($a_fns !== $b_fns) {
00129                 return true;
00130         }
00131         
00132         foreach ($a_fns as $fn) {
00133                 if ($fn == '.' || $fn == '..') {
00134                         continue;
00135                 }
00136                 if (is_dir($a.'/'.$fn) || is_dir($b.'/'.$fn)) {
00137                         if (dir_is_different($a.'/'.$fn, $b.'/'.$fn)) {
00138                                 return true;
00139                         }
00140                 } else {
00141                         if (file_is_different($a.'/'.$fn, $b.'/'.$fn)) {
00142                                 return true;
00143                         }
00144                 }
00145         }
00146         
00147         return false;
00148 }

00170 /**
00171  *      explode a string splitting it by whitespace characters
00172  *
00173  *      @param string $s input string
00174  *      @param bool $honor_quot don't split inside quotation marks
00175  *      @return array of strings
00176  */
00177 function expl_whitesp($s, $honor_quot = false)
00178 {
00179         // same characters as trim() uses
00180         $whitesp = array(' ', "\t", "\n", "\r", "\0", "\x0B");
00181         $quot = array('"', "'");
00182         $ret = array();
00183 
00184         $prev = -1;
00185         $cur_quot = false;
00186         
00187         for ($i=0; $i < strlen($s); $i++) {
00188                 if ($honor_quot && in_array($s[$i], $quot)) {
00189                         if ($cur_quot === false) {
00190                                 // begin of quote
00191                                 $cur_quot = $s[$i];
00192                         } elseif ($cur_quot == $s[$i] && ($i < 1 || $s[$i-1] != "\\")) {
00193                                 // end of quote
00194                                 $cur_quot = false;
00195                         }
00196                 }
00197                 if ($cur_quot !== false) {
00198                         // do nothing while on a quote
00199                         continue;
00200                 }
00201                 if (in_array($s[$i], $whitesp)) {
00202                         if ($prev+1 == $i) {
00203                                 $prev++;
00204                         } else {
00205                                 $ret[] = substr($s, $prev+1, $i-$prev-1);
00206                                 $prev = $i;
00207                         }
00208                 }
00209         }
00210         if ($prev+2 < $i) {
00211                 $ret[] = substr($s, $prev+1);
00212         }
00213         
00214         return $ret;
00215 }

00291 /**
00292  *      check if the user is http digest authenticated
00293  *
00294  *      @param array $users array of possible users (usernames as keys, 
00295  *      password as values)
00296  *      @param string $realm realm (e.g. name of the site)
00297  *      @retval 0 authenticated
00298  *      @retval -1 user did not request authentication
00299  *      @retval -2 parts of the response are missing
00300  *      @retval -3 unknown username
00301  *      @retval -4 invalid password
00302  */
00303 function http_digest_check($users, $realm = '')
00304 {
00305         // code based on the php documentation
00306         if (empty($_SERVER['PHP_AUTH_DIGEST'])) {
00307                 return -1;
00308         } else {
00309                 $auth = $_SERVER['PHP_AUTH_DIGEST'];
00310         }
00311         
00312         // taken from one of the comments
00313         $data = array();
00314         preg_match("/username=\"([^\"]+)\"/i", $auth, $match);
00315         if (isset($match[1])) {
00316                 $data['username'] = $match[1];
00317         } else {
00318                 return -2;
00319         }
00320         preg_match('/nonce=\"([^\"]+)\"/i', $auth, $match);
00321         if (isset($match[1])) {
00322                 $data['nonce'] = $match[1];
00323         } else {
00324                 return -2;
00325         }
00326         preg_match('/nc=([0-9a-f]+)/i', $auth, $match);
00327         if (isset($match[1])) {
00328                 $data['nc'] = $match[1];
00329         } else {
00330                 return -2;
00331         }
00332         preg_match('/cnonce=\"([^\"]+)\"/i', $auth, $match);
00333         if (isset($match[1])) {
00334                 $data['cnonce'] = $match[1];
00335         } else {
00336                 return -2;
00337         }
00338         // fixed for Safari
00339         // qop comes as qop="auth"
00340         preg_match('/qop=\"?([^,\"]+)/i', $auth, $match);
00341         if (isset($match[1])) {
00342                 $data['qop'] = $match[1];
00343         } else {
00344                 return -2;
00345         }
00346         preg_match('/uri=\"([^\"]+)\"/i', $auth, $match);
00347         if (isset($match[1])) {
00348                 $data['uri'] = $match[1];
00349         } else {
00350                 return -2;
00351         }
00352         preg_match('/response=\"([^\"]+)\"/i', $auth, $match);
00353         if (isset($match[1])) {
00354                 $data['response'] = $match[1];
00355         } else {
00356                 return -2;
00357         }
00358         
00359         // check username
00360         if (!array_key_exists($data['username'], $users)) {
00361                 return -3;
00362         }
00363         
00364         // generate the valid response
00365         $a1 = md5($data['username'].':'.str_replace("\"", '', $realm).':'.$users[$data['username']]);
00366         $a2 = md5($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'].':'.$data['uri']);
00367         $valid_response = md5($a1.':'.$data['nonce'].':'.$data['nc'].':'.$data['cnonce'].':'.$data['qop'].':'.$a2);
00368         
00369         if ($data['response'] != $valid_response) {
00370                 return -4;
00371         } else {
00372                 return 0;
00373         }
00374 }

00452 /**
00453  *      delete a file or directory
00454  *
00455  *      @param string $f file name
00456  *      @return true if successful, false if not
00457  */
00458 function rm_recursive($f)
00459 {
00460         if (@is_file($f) || @is_link($f)) {
00461                 // note: symlinks get deleted right away, and not recursed into
00462                 return @unlink($f);
00463         } else {
00464                 if (($childs = @scandir($f)) === false) {
00465                         return false;
00466                 }
00467                 // strip a tailing slash
00468                 if (substr($f, -1) == '/') {
00469                         $f = substr($f, 0, -1);
00470                 }
00471                 foreach ($childs as $child) {
00472                         if ($child == '.' || $child == '..') {
00473                                 continue;
00474                         } else {
00475                                 rm_recursive($f.'/'.$child);
00476                         }
00477                 }
00478                 return @rmdir($f);
00479         }
00480 }

00483 /**
00484  *      serve a file to the client
00485  *
00486  *      this function only returns on errors.
00487  *      @param string $fn filename
00488  *      @param bool $dl download file
00489  *      @param string $mime mime type
00490  */
00491 function serve_file($fn, $dl, $mime = '')
00492 {
00493         if (($size = @filesize($fn)) === false) {
00494                 return false;
00495         }
00496         if (empty($mime)) {
00497                 // fall back to octet-stream
00498                 $mime = 'application/octet-stream';
00499         }
00500         
00501         // TODO (later): optionally set the mime type based on the file extension only
00502         // see http://www.php.net/manual/en/function.readfile.php#52722
00503         // TODO (later): handle byte range
00504         // TODO (later): handle if-modified-since etc
00505         // TODO (later): also check apache_request_headers()
00506         
00507         if ($dl) {
00508                 // these are taken from the php documentation (on readfile())
00509                 header('Content-Description: File Transfer');
00510                 header('Content-Type: application/octet-stream');
00511                 header('Content-Disposition: attachment; filename='.basename($fn));
00512                 header('Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary');
00513         } else {
00514                 header('Content-Type: '.$mime);
00515         }

00539 /**
00540  *      find a unique filename for copying a file to destination directory
00541  *
00542  *      @param string $dir destination directory
00543  *      @param string $orig_fn original filename
00544  *      @return string (basename) proposed filename
00545  */
00546 function unique_filename($dir, $orig_fn)
00547 {
00548         // strip any slash at the end of $dir
00549         if (substr($dir, -1) == '/') {
00550                 $dir = substr($dir, 0, -1);
00551         }
00552         
00553         $fn = basename($orig_fn);
00554         $num = 1;
00555         // is_link() is there to catch dangling symlinks
00556         while (is_file($dir.'/'.$fn) || is_dir($dir.'/'.$fn) || is_link($dir.'/'.$fn)) {
00557                 // find first dot and prepend _$num there
00558                 // TODO (later): we could handle the case where $orig_fn is already 
00559                 // something like foo_2.bar
00560                 $fn = basename($orig_fn);
00561                 if (($p = strpos($fn, '.')) !== false) {
00562                         $fn = substr($fn, 0, $p).'_'.(++$num).substr($fn, $p);
00563                 } else {
00564                         $fn .= '_'.(++$num);
00565                 }
00566         }
00567         
00568         return $fn;
00569 }

00572 /**
00573  *      print human-readable information about a variable in inline format
00574  *
00575  *      @param mixed $var variable
00576  *      @return string
00577  */
00578 function var_dump_inl($var)
00579 {
00580         // print_r returns true/false as '1'/''
00581         // fix this at least for the value of $var itself
00582         if (is_bool($var) && $var) {
00583                 return 'true';
00584         } elseif (is_bool($var)) {
00585                 return 'false';
00586         }
00587         
00588         $ret = print_r($var, true);
00589         // remove control characters
00590         $ret = str_replace("\n", ' ', $ret);
00591         $ret = str_replace("\r", ' ', $ret);
00592         $ret = str_replace("\t", ' ', $ret);
00593         // remove double spaces
00594         do {
00595                 $ret = str_replace('  ', ' ', $ret, $cnt);
00596         } while (0 < $cnt);
00597         return trim($ret);
00598 }
